CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Packaged for Distribution stage positioned above or below the Delivered to Retail stage?
SRP.A: The Packaged for Distribution stage is positioned {above} the Delivered to Retail stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Packaged for Distribution?
VE.A: The value of stage Packaged for Distribution is {3019}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Post-Harvest?
VE.A: The value of stage Post-Harvest is {7350}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Total Harvested Crop, with a value of {10519}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Delivered to Retail, with a value of {2497}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Post-Processing to stage Filtered by Quality Inspection?
SC.A: Decreased by {1581} Tons from stage Post-Processing to stage Filtered by Quality Inspection.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Filtered by Quality Inspection to stage Packaged for Distribution?
SC.A: Decreased by {1033} Tons from stage Filtered by Quality Inspection to stage Packaged for Distribution.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 8934? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 3535? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Packaged for Distribution} stage has {3019}, the {Delivered to Retail} stage has {2497}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 3535 and 6491? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Post-Processing} stage has {5633}, the {Filtered by Quality Inspection} stage has {4052}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Packaged for Distribution to Delivered to Retail, or from stage Post-Processing to Filtered by Quality Inspection?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Post-Processing} to {Filtered by Quality Inspection} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Post-Processing to Filtered by Quality Inspection, from stage Total Harvested Crop to Post-Harvest, or from stage Packaged for Distribution to Delivered to Retail?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Total Harvested Crop} to stage {Post-Harvest} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Total Harvested Crop} and {Post-Harvest} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Packaged for Distribution} and {Delivered to Retail} stages.
